properties.Name: CustomerWorkoutProceeding
properties.Description:
A customer workout is an out-of-court arrangement between a creditor and debtor in which:

-  The debtor agrees to pay less than the full amount of debt
-  The debtor is provided extra time to pay debts
-  The debtor will pay a reduced amount of debt over a specified time

Columns.Name: WorkoutProceedingId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Workout Proceeding.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: WorkoutStartingPeriod
Columns.Description: The starting period of the Workout.

Columns.Name: WorkoutEndingPeriod
Columns.Description: The ending period of the Workout.

Columns.Name: WorkoutEffectiveDate
Columns.Description: The effective date of the agreed to Workout.

Columns.Name: TotalWorkoutPaymentAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount of payments to be made under the Workout.

Columns.Name: NumberOfPayments
Columns.Description: The number of payments agreed to.

Columns.Name: PaymentAmount
Columns.Description: The payment amount of each payment to be made by the Customer.

Columns.Name: PaymentPeriod
Columns.Description: The payment period(s) that each regular payment will be made.

Columns.Name: CompositionAgreementIndicator
Columns.Description:
A Composition is an agreement between the debtor and creditor in which the creditor agrees to take less than the full amount of the debts and to provide an extension of time for the debtor to pay the debt.

Creditors cannot be forced to become part of a Composition plan.   Any creditor may refuse to join the composition plan and continue their individual collection activities.

Columns.Name: WorkoutProceedingNote
Columns.Description: Notes, comments or additional information regarding the Workout.

Properties.Description:
A customer workout is an out-of-court arrangement between a creditor and debtor in which:

-  The debtor agrees to pay less than the full amount of debt
-  The debtor is provided extra time to pay debts
-  The debtor will pay a reduced amount of debt over a specified time
